column6: Explains her admiration of the Machine
column18: With Finch taken by Root, Reese wants him back. But the Machine has other plans.
On a tip from the Machine, Reese and Carter head to Texas to find Finch
While Reese protects a diplomat's daughter, Finch deals with trauma and paranoia

Reese protects a journalist on the hunt for "the Man in the Suit"
Reese and Zoe move to the suburbs

column16: Aids team with financial crime know-how
column18: Reese and Finch tread carefully when a cardiologist is coerced into murder by an enigmatic operative
When the numbers of a married couple come up, Reese and Finch play counselor
A cab driver with an unusual past comes under threat
When Reese is protecting a pair of righteous thieves, Agent Donnelly closes in once more.

column10: Tries to expose Reese as a fighter
column18: With Reese in Rikers, Finch has to go undercover to assess the latest number
Carter plays a dangerous game when Donnelly has her interrogate the Men in Suits
Stanton uses Reese and Snow to conduct an operation at the behest of an unknown agency
A reckless tech billionaire gets under Reese's skin and gets curious about the Team's m.o.

column15: Distracts assassins, gets prostitution ring arrested
column18: Reese and Finch go undercover at a hotel to protect a maid from threats from her past.
The government has a secret agency, an assassination machine that knows no borders...or mercy
When six numbers are given to the Team, they seek out a serial killer on a storm battered island
Atlantic City gets the Team's attention when an old gambler is targeted by his employers
Rylatech comes under Finch's scrutiny, while Carter doubts Cal's allegiance
While Reese hunts the poisoner of a noted doctor, Carter learns of Fusco's dirty past

column2: Explains Thornhill; joins Root after she threatens Grace
column6: Discovers Thornhill and learns of daily deaths
column7: Teams up with Reese to find Finch
column11: Greer & co. attempt to get admin access

column6: Put in asylum; recruited by the Machine
column9: Frames Carter, tries to kill Elias
column18: Finch and Root gets closer to the Machine than ever before, with Shaw and Reese hot on their heels. Meanwhile, Carter investigation of Cal's death kicks a hornest nest.
